name: Hangman 3D Mini Games
description:
3 Novelty Hangman Games

Classic hangman games made in 3D Anaglyph with a twist as you choose whether to save the characters or not.

Haunted House

There is a ghost in the house which needs to be exorcised. - or not.

Solitary Swimmer

Pretty blonde lady alone in the ocean. What lurks beneath?

Rooster

Will the rooster get across the road?
